Extension.name: calendarMonthModel
Extension.initParam: Provides details about assigned month for rendering a calendar and events.

Extension.name: rxs_ExtractIdsFromSlot
Extension.initParam: Returns a list of the owner content ids from the relationships in the specified slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot whose owner content ids should be parsed from its relationships.

Extension.name: rxs_BuildRelationshipsFromIds
Extension.initParam: Returns a list of the owner content ids from the relationships in the specified slot.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: fieldname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the field providing the ids. (required)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: slotname
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the slot whose relationships should be modified to match ids contained in field. (required)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: templatename
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The name of the template to be added to slot when relationships are created. (required)

Extension.name: rxs_SiteFolderAssembly
Extension.initParam: Builds a publishing location from site folders

Extension.name: rxs_ExpandRecurringEvents
Extension.initParam: Expands recurring events defined by recurringEvents.dtd and converts into sys_AssemblerInfo.dtd suitible for use with AutoRelatedContent.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: calendarStart
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The start datetime of the calendar being generated. No recurring event instances before this datetime will be returned. This parameter is required.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: calendarEnd
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The end datetime of the calendar being generated. No recurring event instances on or after this datetime will be returned. This parameter is required.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: defaultFilename
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: default filename if non provided

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: providedFilename
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: provided filename

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: updateResource
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: update resource name

Extension.name: rxs_SiteFolderContentListBulkBuilder
Extension.initParam: The site folder root will be queried based on the request's sys_siteid parameter. It flushes all caches (Assembler, Resource, ManageNav and Folder cache) on a Publishing Hub. For debugging purpose, the result set will be sorted if the request contains a HTML parameter sys_sort=1.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: filenameContext
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Id of the context used to generate just filenames for content items (this exit will supply the path)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: deliveryType
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Determines the value of the deliverytype attribute of the contentlist root element. defaults to 'ftp'.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: isIncremental
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: 'y' to generate an incremental publishing content list, 'n' for full publishing. defaults to 'n'

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: contentValidValues
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma-delimited list of contentvalid values for states that are eligible for publishing

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: maxRowsPerPage
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: enables pagination mode by determining the maximum number of content items to appear in a single page of the content list. Defaults to -1 (disables pagination mode; unlimited number of items)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: contentResourceName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content items and its related variants lookup resource name, default is rx_supportSiteFolderContentList/getSFPContentList.xml. However, the application will process the SQL ResultSet only, not XML document

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ParamListToPass
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of all non standard HTML parameters to pass on from request to the content URL for each item in the content list

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: protocol
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The HTTP protocol to use when constructing the content URL, defaults to HTTP

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: host
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The host name or ip address to use when constructing the content URL, defaults to the current server

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: port
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The port to use when constructing the content URL, defaults to the current server's listening port

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: subFolderPath
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: A sub folder of the published site. This is used when publishing a sub folder of a site, not the whole site. Defaults to the site folder if not specified. Note, make sure to use URL encoded path if this is specified in URL of the content list. For example, use %2F for slash '/' characters.

Extension.name: rxs_SiteFolderContentListBuilder
Extension.initParam: The site folder root will be queried based on the request's sys_siteid parameter. It flushes all caches (Assembler, Resource, ManageNav and Folder cache) on a Publishing Hub. For debugging purpose, the result set will be sorted if the request contains a HTML parameter sys_sort=1.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: filenameContext
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Id of the context used to generate just filenames for content items (this exit will supply the path)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: deliveryType
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Determines the value of the deliverytype attribute of the contentlist root element. defaults to 'ftp'.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: isIncremental
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: 'y' to generate an incremental publishing content list, 'n' for full publishing. defaults to 'n'

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: contentValidValues
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma-delimited list of contentvalid values for states that are eligible for publishing

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: maxRowsPerPage
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: enables pagination mode by determining the maximum number of content items to appear in a single page of the content list. Defaults to -1 (disables pagination mode; unlimited number of items)

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: contentVariantResourceName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Content variant lookup resource name, default is rx_supportSiteFolderContentList/lookupVariantsBySiteItem.xml

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ParamListToPass
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Comma separated list of all non standard HTML parameters to pass on from request to the content URL for each item in the content list

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: protocol
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The HTTP protocol to use when constructing the content URL, defaults to HTTP

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: host
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The host name or ip address to use when constructing the content URL, defaults to the current server

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: port
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: The port to use when constructing the content URL, defaults to the current server's listening port

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: subFolderPath
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: A sub folder of the published site. This is used when publishing a sub folder of a site, not the whole site. It is default to the site folder if not specified.

Extension.name: rxs_CopyValueToRequest
Extension.initParam: Copies the values to the request object as parameters

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: paramName
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: delimited names of the parameters to be set

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: paramValue
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: delimited values of the parameters

Extension.name: rxs_MakeCalendar
Extension.initParam: This exit takes the result document (based on sys_AssemblerInfo DTD) and transforms it into another DTD (calendar.dtd) that is used by the stylesheet to generate the calendar.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: startDate
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Any date in the month for creating the calendar

Extension.name: rxs_AutoSiteItemFilter
Extension.initParam: Filters the items based on the site folder hierarchy.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ItemSiteFolderURL
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: the url of a resource that produces the site folder root xml file. ../rx_supportSiteFolderContentList/lookupSiteFolderRoot.xml

Extension.name: rxs_TouchAutoIndices
Extension.initParam: This extension touches the last modify date and last modifier for all AutoIndex variants and their parents registered in the system. Add this extension to a content list generator resource.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: ContentValidList
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Comma separated list of content valid character attributes of the workflow states. Default is 'Y','I','y','i'

Extension.name: rxs_pubAppendPurgedOrMovedItems
Extension.initParam:
The objectives of this extension are to filter the content list for publishing by appending the content items/pages that were published earlier and are:
1. Purged from the system 2. Removed from a folder 3. Moved from one folder to another
to the unpublish content list XML result document. It uses the following algorithm to do the above:
1. Gets all previously published items/pages to the site by making an internal request to a Rhythmyx resource. These are obtained as a result set for performance reasons. 2. Gets the parent folderids for each of the items. While doing so, it assumes the item can exist in multiple folders. 3. It generates publish paths for each of the folders it exists in. 4. It filters out any item with publish path not matching with the previously published location path. 5. It builds the content list document for these remaining items/pages by making another internal request to a Rhythmyx resource. 6. Finally, this list is merged with the result document which is already an unpublish content list document.
The exit takes one optional parameter to indicate if the publish path comparison should be case sensitive. The default value for this is "no". It assumes the DTD of the result document to be contentlist.dtd and the content list being generated is for unpublishing.

PSXExtensionParamDef.name: isPathCaseSensitive
PSXExtensionParamDef.description: Optional. Is the publocation case sensitive? Specify "yes" (case insensitive) if the publocation is case sensitive. Default is "no".
